SOLAR

Ground screw solutions for solar

American Ground Screw’s products are designed, tested and included as an engineered foundation option for all major 2” and 3” rigid pipe racking systems. An easy alternative to concrete for all installers, whether experienced with ground screws or not. You can trust our team here at American Ground Screw to guide you through your ground mounts for solar projects to not only ensure you receive the products you need, but the services you’re seeking as well. We offer unparalleled industry knowledge to each project and client we serve, and that’s why you can’t go wrong with choosing us for your ground solar mounting demands. We pave the way with our services and supplies and offer easy-to-install solar ground mounts so all businesses and homeowners can relax into trust with their project and solar arrangement. It’s a big undertaking to install solar on any type of property, especially non-roof mounted panel arrays. Our team of experts works diligently to create and offer customized, cost-effective solar ground mount your team can rely on for years to come.

Ground screws offer the following advantages for ground mount solar installations:

  • Work best in dense, very dense, very stiff, and hard soils; 
  • Ideal for rock, where the design is often based on yield strength as opposed to cohesion; 
  • No digging or soil removal needed; 
  • Immediately loadable, no need to wait for curing. 

Ground screws offer the following sustainability advantages as well:

  • 97.5% less embedded carbon than concrete needed for similar performance; 
  • Warrantied for 20 years, but have 50+ year lifecycle; 
  • Screws can be reused or recycled at any time. 

Installation

Ground screws are easy to install with either machine-mounted hydraulic or handheld electric drivers.

APPLICATIONS

Trackers

Carports

Battery Storage
